metadata.title: CVE-2018-4700 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2018-4300.Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2018-4300. Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2018-4300 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4700` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
cups-bsd - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
cups-client - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
cups-common - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
cups-core-drivers - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
cups-daemon - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
cups-ppdc - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
cups-server-common - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
libcups2 - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
libcupscgi1 - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
libcupsimage2 - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
libcupsmime1 - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
libcupsppdc1 - 1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.2-0ubuntu1.11').
